ovdesc.p: Used to define the rules for allocating orders to a segment.

desc.p: The segment to which orders that match the criteria will be allocated. Must be a valid SC.DEALER.DESK.SEGMENT.
Standard operand field, can be EQ, NE, LT, LE, GT or GE.
The value of the data to be used for matching criteria.
Record key, must be either a valid SECURITY.MASTER id, SUB.ASSET.TYPE id (prefixed by S-), ASSET.TYPE id (prefixed by A-) or SYSTEM.
Application from where data is to be retrived, can be SEC.OPEN.ORDER or SECURITY.MASTER
Default segment to be allocated to orders that do not match the criteria specified. Must be a valid SC.DEALER.DESK.SEGMENT.

The field used in the associater APPLICATION, must be a field from the STANDARD.SELECTION record, either System or User defined. It is not recommened that multi- or sub- valued fields are specified as only the first value will be used to check the criteria.
Allows for multiple values to be specified, can be "*", ",", "." or "/".
